title._content: Chesterfield and Keene Stagecoach in Keene, NH

description._content: TITLE Chesterfield and Keene Stagecoach in Keene, NH CREATOR SUBJECT Stagecoaches - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Postcard of the Stagecoach driven between Chesterfield and Keene New Hampshire, taken in the early 1900s. It was accompanied by the following letter to the Hampshire Press, dated 1/10/1938: "It has been called to my attention that your calendar for this year carries the picture of my father and the old stage coach which he used to drive between Chesterfield and Keene" and is signed by Vera E. White. We can assume that the drive, then, is George White. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080430 DATE ORIGINAL 1900?-1906? RESOURCE TYPE photographic postcards FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsyktnp019 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
